com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPTextBox

java.lang.Object
  LinearLayout
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPTextBox
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WPTextBox
extends LinearLayout

Note: in most situations, setting the background of an EditText using colors and Drawables will accomplish the same effect without the additional layout used by this WPTextBox.WPTextBoxView.

WPTextBox with label, place holder, and various unique states.

A modification of EditText android.widget.EditText that allows you in XML or code to specify a label to be placed above the TextBox, a place holder to display when necessary, and UI states that correspond to those in Windows Phone 7.

Since:
13-07-2012
